hero.title: Authentic Mexican Cuisine
hero.subtitle: Experience the true flavors of Mexico at Taco Shop in Reno, Nevada.

important.announcement: Family-owned and operated in the heart of downtown Reno.
important.highlight: Authentic Mexican cuisine in the heart of Reno, Nevada.

about.heading: Fresh & Authentic
paragraphs: At Taco Shop, we pride ourselves on serving the most authentic Mexican cuisine in Reno. Our recipes have been passed down through generations, bringing the true flavors of Mexico to your plate.
We use only the freshest ingredients, locally sourced when possible, to create delicious tacos, burritos, and more that will transport your taste buds straight to Mexico.

sections.title: TACOS
sections.description: Soft corn tortillas, choice of salsa: roja, verde or pico

items.name: Pastor
items.description: Marinated pork, grilled onion & pineapple, cilantro

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, house spread

items.name: Veggie
items.description: Fried cauliflower, green apple, green pepper, onions & cilantro

items.name: Burrito
items.description: Chicken, cheese, black beans, rice, corn, pico de gallo, chips + salsa

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Chicken, cheese, black beans, corn, pico de gallo, avocado crema, sour cream, jalapeños

items.name: Quesadilla
items.description: Chicken, green & red peppers, cheese, onions, chipotle sauce, sour cream, salsa, corn

items.name: 3 Taquitos
items.description: Chicken, tomato sauce, lettuce, cotija, sour cream

items.name: Torta
items.description: Choice of chicken, asada, pastor or carnitas, onion, lettuce, tomato, avocado, queso fresco, sour cream, jalapeños

items.name: Chips & Dips
items.description: Choice of verde or rojo w/pico de gallo

items.name: Soda
items.description: Can or bottled coke, diet coke, 7up, sprite, sidral, sangria, jarritos, (fruit punch, pineapple, mandarin, lime, strawberry or tamarind)
